issue.title: [CF 1083] Error loading TMW
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Enable TellMeWhen
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Addon does not load and says
"TellMeWhenOptions cannot be loaded if TellMeWhen failed to initialize!"

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Message: ...ponents\IconTypes\IconType_wpnenchant\wpnenchant.lua:76: bad argument #1 to 'wipe' (table expected, got number)
Time: 01/26/15 19:11:09
Count: 1
Stack: (tail call): ?
[C]: ?
...ponents\IconTypes\IconType_wpnenchant\wpnenchant.lua:76: in function `?'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2900: in function `DoUpgrade'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2912: in function `DoUpgrade'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3026: in function `UpgradeGlobal'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1910: in function `InitializeDatabase'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1827: in function `?'
...ore\libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:145: in function <...ore\libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:145>
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4>
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?'
...ore\libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:90: in function `Fire'
...\AddOns\DataStore\libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:120: in function <...\AddOns\DataStore\libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119>

Locals: (*temporary) = "PLAYER_LOGIN"
(*temporary) = "PLAYER_LOGIN"
(*temporary) = <function> defined =[C]:-1

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I notice it says that all the loaded profiles finish a one-time upgrade to v7.0.0, but the .lua I have attached still references the old 6.2 versions for all the toon names at the end of the file.


> Posted by CurseForge user Legath5 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1083 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Legath5

Fixed in g4c549ab.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks. Is that a new version that is available?


> Posted by CurseForge user Legath5

Nevermind I found the files section. New version worked!! Thanks so much for your quick response and active support of the addon. Small donation for your efforts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Legath5
